name: Introduction to Rocket Propulsion
description: Basic principles of rocket propulsion and rocket engines.

lessons.name: History of Rocketry
lessons.description: A brief history of rocketry and space exploration.

lessons.name: Rocket Propulsion Fundamentals
lessons.description: Basic principles of rocket propulsion.

lessons.name: Rocket Engine Types
lessons.description: Overview of different types of rocket engines.

name: Fuel and Combustion
description: Understanding rocket fuel, combustion processes, and efficiency.

lessons.name: Rocket Fuel
lessons.description: Overview of different types of rocket fuels.

lessons.name: Combustion Processes
lessons.description: Understanding combustion processes and efficiency.

lessons.name: Combustion Instability
lessons.description: Understanding combustion instability and mitigation.

name: Nozzle Design
description: Principles of rocket nozzle design and performance optimization.

lessons.name: Nozzle Design
lessons.description: Overview of different types of rocket nozzles.

lessons.name: Nozzle Performance
lessons.description: Understanding nozzle performance and efficiency.

lessons.name: Nozzle Optimization
lessons.description: Optimizing nozzle design for specific applications.

name: Fundamentals of Aerodynamics
description: Basic aerodynamic concepts and fluid dynamics principles.

lessons.name: Introduction to Aerodynamics
lessons.description: Overview of basic aerodynamic principles and fluid mechanics.

lessons.name: Airfoil Theory
lessons.description: Understanding the shape of airfoils and their effects on lift and drag.

lessons.name: Lift and Drag
lessons.description: An exploration of lift and drag forces on aerodynamic bodies.

name: Subsonic and Supersonic Flow
description: Understanding subsonic and supersonic aerodynamic behaviors.

lessons.name: Subsonic Flow
lessons.description: Key principles and behavior of subsonic airflow.

lessons.name: Supersonic Flow
lessons.description: Understanding airflow and shock waves at supersonic speeds.

lessons.name: Mach Number and Shock Waves
lessons.description: The impact of Mach number on flow characteristics and the formation of shock waves.

name: Aerodynamic Heating
description: Study of aerodynamic heating and thermal protection systems.

lessons.name: Introduction to Aerodynamic Heating
lessons.description: Basic concepts of aerodynamic heating due to air compression.

lessons.name: Thermal Protection Systems
lessons.description: Overview of materials and techniques used in protecting structures from aerodynamic heating.

lessons.name: Reentry Heating
lessons.description: Understanding the severe heating experienced during atmospheric reentry.

name: Spacecraft Structural Design
description: Fundamentals of designing spacecraft structures and materials selection.

lessons.name: Introduction to Structural Design
lessons.description: Overview of spacecraft structures and their design considerations.

lessons.name: Materials Selection
lessons.description: Understanding material properties and selecting appropriate materials for spacecraft structures.

lessons.name: Stress and Load Analysis
lessons.description: How to perform stress and load analysis for spacecraft structures.

name: Orbital Mechanics
description: Understanding orbital dynamics and mission planning.

lessons.name: Introduction to Orbital Mechanics
lessons.description: Fundamentals of orbital motion and the forces affecting spacecraft orbits.

lessons.name: Kepler's Laws
lessons.description: Application of Kepler's laws to understand orbital mechanics.

lessons.name: Mission Planning
lessons.description: How to plan and execute space missions, including trajectory design.

name: Spacecraft Systems Engineering
description: Overview of spacecraft systems and subsystems engineering.

lessons.name: Systems Engineering Fundamentals
lessons.description: Introduction to systems engineering and its role in spacecraft design.

lessons.name: Subsystem Design
lessons.description: Understanding spacecraft subsystems and their interactions.

lessons.name: Integration and Testing
lessons.description: How to integrate and test spacecraft systems for successful operation.
